content: this is a crochet pattern for a tapestry crochet halloween coaster with a bat this pattern is from the spooky halloween collection the coaster is double-sided and quite thick the pattern uses tapestry crochet technique it includes detailed photo instructions so even if you haven t tried this technique before you should be able to complete this item without any problem the pattern includes - written instructions in us terms - abbreviations used - pattern notes - photo instructions - a color chart and explanations how to read it - links to additional photo tutorials on my website for all stitches used in this pattern materials and tools you will need - yarn any thin yarn will work i used soft fraya cotton 8/4 100% organic cotton 50g 180 m colors black and orange - crochet hook size recommended on your yarn label i used a 2 0 mm hook - tapestry needle measurements 9 0 x 9 5 cm you can purchase a pdf pattern at the nordic hook shop here 1 join nordic hook club to get all ad-free patterns stitch tutorials and e-books in pdf format here 2 1 https //nordichookshop com/products/spooky-halloween-coaster-with-a-bat 2 https //nordichookclub com/sign-up/
